mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membership_member_inbody ( membership_member_entrance_record_id, trainer_application_id, weight, skeletal_muscle_mass, body_fat_mass, BMI, percent_body_fat, height, age, gender, inbody_date, last_update ) VALUES ( #{membershipMemberEntranceRecordId}, #{trainerApplicationId}, #{weight}, #{skeletalMuscleMass}, #{bodyFatMass}, #{BMI}, #{percentBodyFat}, #{height}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{inbodyDate}, NOW() )
